casebody.data:
Anthony B. CASSIUS, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Lee MORTIMER, Glenn Neville, as Ancillary Executor of the Estate of Jack Lait, deceased, Crown Publishers, Inc. and American Book-Stratford Press, Inc., Defendants-Appellees. No. 266, Docket 24936. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued March 25, 1958. Decided March 25, 1958. Squadron & Alter, New York City (Howard M. Squadron, New York City, and Allen M. Lewin, New York City, on the brief), for plaintiff-appellant. Townley, Updike, Carter & Rodgers, New York City (James W. Rodgers, New York City and Andrew L. Hughes, New York City, on the brief), for defendant-appellant Crown Publishers, Inc. Weisman, Celler, Allan, Spett & Shein-berg, New York City (Adolph Kaufman, New York City and Ralph J. Schwarz, Jr., New York City, on the brief), for defendant-appellee American Book-Stratford Press, Inc.

Before CLARK, Chief Judge, LUMBARD, Circuit Judge, and DIMOCK, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
